## Ignore Visual Studio temporary files, build results, and cache
*.obj
*.exe
*.pdb
*.ilk
*.log
*.tlog
*.tmp
*.user
*.aps
*.pch
*.vspscc
*.vssscc
*.ncb
*.suo
*.sdf
*.ipch
*.opensdf
*.cachefile

## Visual Studio folders
.vs/
Debug/
Release/
x64/
x86/
ipch/
bin/
build/
[Bb]uild*/
[Bb]in*/
[Oo]bj*/

## CMake-generated files (if using CMake later)
CMakeFiles/
CMakeCache.txt
cmake_install.cmake
Makefile

## Other files and folders to ignore
*.VC.db
*.VC.opendb
*.sln.docstates

# VS Code (optional)
.vscode/

# Backup & crash files
*.bak
*.tmp
*.log

# Optional: ignore personal settings or test output
*.db
*.csv
*.out
*.err

# Ignore environment-specific settings
*.local
